title: Full Stack Developer - 11601 NEW!
full_description: Walker Elliott is working on an outstanding career role for a Full Stack Developer to build new, exciting, interactive applications on a team.Responsibilities:Develop new applications for the logistics industry.Help define best practices with development and architecture.Deliver custom application and integration solutions.Participate in Agile methodology activities.Work with the business to achieve goals.Implement new features and help with bug fixes.Requirements:BA/BS or equivalent work experience.Must have strong web UI skills.Strong ASP.NET, C#, MVC, SQL ServerHTML5, CSS3Angular/ReactTest Driven DevelopmentKnow branching strategies in addition to source code repository.Do not apply unless you are authorized to work in the United States for any employer as client company cannot sponsor or transfer visas at this time.Walker Elliott is an Equal Opportunity Employer.For additional information, please email your resume to resumes@walker-elliott.com or apply online.http://www.walkerelliott.com/candidates/jobs/jobDetail/default.aspx?GUID=11601&Apply=true
